title: COVID-19 and the HIV care continuum in Uganda: minimising collateral damage

authors.name: Enock Kagimu
authors.affiliation: Infectious Diseases Institute, Makerere University, Kampala, Uganda

authors.name: Emily M. Martyn
authors.affiliation: North Middlesex University Hospital, London, UK

authors.name: Jane Gakuru
authors.affiliation: Makerere University, Kampala

acknowledgementText: This work was supported by the African Academy of Sciences (AAS) through the THRiVE-2 programme, through grants DEL-15-011 and DEL-15-130.
abstract: We explore the potential impact of COVID-19 public health measures on the HIV care continuum in Uganda and suggest priorities to minimise collateral damage.
notes: Acknowledges DEL-15-011 and DEL-15-130 (DELTAS). Good ORCID coverage for some authors.
